info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 29 at 4:53PM HST until January 30 at 6:00AM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM HST MONDAY FOR OAHU KAUAI AND NIIHAU... .Strong and gusty trade winds will continue through tonight with the strongest winds expected over mountain areas and along leeward slopes of Kauai and Oahu. ...WIND ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM HST MONDAY... * WHAT...Northeast winds 20 to 30 mph with localized gusts up to 50 mph. * WHERE...Portions of Kauai, Niihau and Oahu. * WHEN...Until 6 AM HST Monday. * IMPACTS...Winds this strong can tear off shingles, knock down tree branches, blow away tents and make it difficult to drive, especially for drivers of high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Watch out for falling tree branches when walking or driving. Make sure tents and awnings are secure or take them down. Be prepared for power outages.
